clean_handle.description: Clean the suitcase's handle to ensure comfort and hygiene.

press_handle.description: Press the handle to check its functionality.

clean_wheel.description: Clean the wheels to ensure smooth movement.

rotate_wheel.description: Rotate the wheel to check its rotation.

clean_suitcase_body.description: Clean the suitcase body to maintain its appearance.

clean_whole_suitcase.description: Clean the entire suitcase including handle, wheel, and body.

press_and_rotate.description: Press the handle and rotate the wheel to check the functionality of suitcase.
